nodes.text: Llollulion was a wealthy Borlovian who, weary of his race's predisposition with stability, became Booster Terrik's copilot during the smuggler's early years aboard the freighter Starwayman. Imprisoned for smuggling, he escaped custody of the Moderate Security Ward of the CoCo Penitentiary in 22 BBY, shortly before the First Battle of Geonosis.
